items.raw_desc: Tea Basilur Carnival Christmas Fantasy 75 g:Have you fallen in love with drinking tea and enjoy it in the peace and quiet of your home? Then you will definitely be interested in Basilur tea. Black tea has been known to mankind since the 16th century. It all starts with the harvesting of the leaves of the Chinese or Assamese tea tree. The next step is the so-called. wilting, which is the process by which water evaporates from the petals. Subsequently, they are scrolled. The final step is the oxidation process. The final taste, aroma and colour of the tea depend most on this part of the processing. Oxidation is stopped by rapid heating, e.g. pan-frying, steaming or baking. You can buy Basilur tea in a 75 g pack. Key features of Basilur Carnival Christmas Fantasy tea 75 g tin Make yourself comfortable with a cup of your favourite tea Black tea is characterized by a pleasantly earthy and invigorating taste 75 g pack

items.raw_desc: Pulzoximéter Contec CMS50D:        The Contec CMS50D oximeter is suitable for use at home, on the road and in medical facilities. It is intended for non-invasive measurement of hemoglobin oxygen saturation, in the arethral part of the bloodstream, and heart rate. It is a suitable tool for asthmatics, people with heart disease, but also athletes and those who move at great heights. To measure, it uses two light rays with different wavelengths, which fall on a finger inserted into the device. It measures the saturation of the blood with oxygen in the range of 0-100% and the heart rate in the range of 30-235 beats per minute. items.raw_desc: Ébresztőóra Sencor SDC 2800 W:Gondod van a korai felkeléssel? Akkor tetszeni fog neked a digitális ébresztőóra a remek Sencor márkától, amelynek köszönhetően nem fogsz elaludni. Ha az otthonodban valaki azok közé tartozik, akik az első csengés után lenyomják az ébresztőórát, itt a szundi (Snooze) funkció, amelynek az a feladata, hogy egy adott idő után megismételje az ébresztést. A pontos idő mellett a szoba hőmérsékletét is megmutatja. Előnyös tulajdonsága a kettős ébresztési rendszer, amelynek köszönhetően két egymástól független ébresztési időpontot is be lehet állítani. Jeho hlavní aktivní složkou je černý jamajský ricinový olej (JBCO), který podporuje zdravý růst vlasů tím, že stimuluje krevní oběh pokožky hlavy a dodává vlasovým folikulům bohaté živiny. Krém intenzivně hydratuje a vyživuje vlasy, zvyšuje jejich pevnost a pružnost, zároveň snižuje lámavost a krepatění. Díky JBCO pomáhá také zmírňovat problémy s lupy, ekzémy či svěděním pokožky hlavy. Jeho použití přispívá ke zjemnění, uzamknutí vlhkosti a podpoře definici kudrlin. Nanotechnologie použitá v krému zajišťuje dlouhotrvající hydrataci a lesk, takže kudrliny zůstávají pružné, pevné a snadno upravitelné. Produkt je čistě veganský a neobsahuje sulfáty ani agresivní složky, takže je vhodný pro pravidelnou péči i pro citlivou pokožku hlavy. Black tea was first mentioned in China at the end of the 16th century. The beginning of production is at the harvest of Chinese or Assam tea leaves. The next step is the so-called. wilting, which is the process by which water evaporates from the petals. The petals are then rolled. The oxidation process, which is part of the final treatment, gives the tea its final flavour, aroma and colour. Oxidation is stopped by rapid heating, e.g. pan-frying, steaming or baking.
